original_text: Afterward, Joshua read all the words of the law—the blessings and the curses—just as it is written in the Book of the Law.
korean_text: 그 후에 여호수아가 율법책에 기록된 모든 것 대로 축복과 저주하는 율법의 모든 말씀을 낭독하였으니

sentences.original_text: Afterward, Joshua read all the words of the law
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 여호수아가 율법의 모든 말씀을 읽었으니

sentences.original_text: just as it is written in the Book of the Law
